thread.title: Pluto is still an ex-planet, no matter what its fans think

title: Pluto is still an ex-planet, no matter what its fans think
text:
22 February 2017 Pluto is still an ex-planet, no matter what its fans think A fresh attempt to revive full planet status for Pluto is a non-starter.
